Author: stock999#4818
Content: Hello guys

Author: stock999#4818
Content: I noticed AtomicDex  in the news channel. What is the project? Where can i find more details about it?   Have they a Discord?

Author: stock999#4818
Content: In particular i'm interested if they are going to develop the application for other operation systems except android&mac, for linux for instance.

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
Hello! AtomicDEX not a separate project but Komodo product: it is mobile cryptocurrency wallet with marketmaker2  atomic swaps protocol support 
You can find more info and enroll for open beta-testing here: https://atomicdex.io/

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
Hey @stock999 

In addition to the AtomicDEX site you can check out some of our previous coverage about it:

 - https://komodoplatform.com/atomic-swaps/
 - https://komodoplatform.com/komodo-and-the-early-pioneers-of-atomic-swaps/
 - https://komodoplatform.com/atomicdex-komodos-revolutionary-p2p-atomic-swap-decentralized-exchange-now-in-public-beta/

Also the AtomicDEX documentation is now online: https://developers.atomicdex.io/

Author: bogybogy#3962
Content: Good morning to everyone

Author: bogybogy#3962
Content: A quick question,is any possibility by a centralised exchange to implement atomic Dex from kmd?maibe looks stupid my question

Author: Audo#5667
Content: yes @bogybogy , anyone can use AtomicAPI to builda DEX product. All the products would share the same liquidity pool, so the more products/users there are, the more liquidity we will have.

Author: Audo#5667
Content: Think of AtomicDEX as a reference product that we use to showcase our technology to get others to come in and develop with it.

Author: bogybogy#3962
Content: Thanks appreciate the support

Author: stock999#4818
Content: Thanks @Audo

Author: Malti#3948
Content:
there are 2 kinds of ICO's imo. 
1) Hype ones => live on marketing and hype. Uneducated people jump in and price fluctuates on announcements
2) tech ones => educated people join the community and follow developments. If these projects fail to deliver, people drop out, no matter the hype (as they weren't hype machines in the first place)

Author: Malti#3948
Content: hybrids also exist
